headline.main: FROM BERMUDA.; The Alleged Slaver "Virginian" Released by Government, but Clutched by Salvors "Out of the Frying-pan into the Fire" $1,000 Demanded for Salvage Late News from Barbados, Jamaica, Demerara, St. Vincent and Antigua.
